# [Interview #1048: WOR Signing Report - IronCaf, Entry #44](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1048#44)

#### Outis

If after speaking the Third Ideal, Kaladin were to betray his oaths, would Syl turn into a Shardblade?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
